page.title: 01Introduction
page.content: {Adbaston Area} The block covered by the Adbaston Women's Institute survey is a rural area in Staffordshire. Most of its 12 Km. squares are occupied by farms. The villages of Adbaston, Bishops Offley, Walk Mill and Offley Hay contain small concentrations of houses. The survey includes accounts of the farming activities; Adbaston's ancient church and Offley Marsh's Methodist Chapel; Adbaston First School; a small nature reserve; The Manor, which is now a private Rest Home; a variety of Women's Clubs and 2 clubs for Senior Citizens; leisure activities and employment, also the views of residents. John Somner Billington, a much respected resident, who died in 1985 is the subject of a biography.
